cs_5_0
dcl_globalFlags refactoringAllowed
dcl_constantbuffer cb0[177], immediateIndexed
dcl_constantbuffer cb1[1], immediateIndexed
dcl_resource_texture2d (float,float,float,float) t0
dcl_resource_texture2d (float,float,float,float) t1
dcl_uav_typed_texture2d (float,float,float,float) u0
dcl_input vThreadIDInGroupFlattened
dcl_input vThreadGroupID.xy
dcl_input vThreadIDInGroup.xy
dcl_temps 10
dcl_tgsm_structured g0, 8, 64
dcl_thread_group 8, 8, 1

// 3DMigoto StereoParams:
dcl_resource_texture2d (float,float,float,float) t125

ld_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r6.xyzw, l(0, 0, 0, 0), t125.xyzw


// WATCH_DOGS2 Camera Position adjustment inserted with DarkStarSword's asmtool.py:
// asmtool.py --fix-wd2-screen-space-reflections-cs --fix-wd2-unproject --fix-wd2-camera-pos -i --only-autofixed dfe8bebb8c9f7aa3-cs.txt

mul r6.w, r6.x, r6.y
mul r8.x, r6.w, cb0[9].x
mul r8.y, r6.w, cb0[10].x
mul r8.z, r6.w, cb0[11].x
mul r8.w, r6.w, cb0[12].x
dp4 r9.x, r8.xyzw, cb0[17].xyzw
dp4 r9.y, r8.xyzw, cb0[18].xyzw
dp4 r9.z, r8.xyzw, cb0[19].xyzw
add r7.xyz, cb0[174].xyz, r9.xyz

imad r0.xy, vThreadGroupID.xyxx, l(32, 32, 0, 0), vThreadIDInGroup.xyxx
mov r1.zw, l(0,0,0,0)
mov r2.zw, l(0,0,0,0)
mov r0.zw, l(0,0,0,0)
mov r3.y, l(0)
loop 
  uge r3.z, r3.y, l(32)
  breakc_nz r3.z
  mov r4.xy, r0.zwzz
  mov r4.z, l(0)
  loop 
    uge r3.z, r4.z, l(32)
    breakc_nz r3.z
    mov r3.x, r4.z
    iadd r1.xy, r0.xyxx, r3.xyxx
    itof r3.xz, r1.xxyx
    lt r5.xy, r3.xzxx, cb0[66].xyxx
    and r3.w, r5.y, r5.x
    if_nz r3.w
      ld_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r1.x, r1.xyzw, t1.wxyz
      div r1.x, r1.x, cb0[176].w
      mul r3.xz, r3.xxzx, cb0[66].zzwz
      add r1.y, r1.x, l(9.999999939E-009)
      log r1.y, r1.y
      max r1.y, r1.y, l(-20.000000)
      mul r3.xz, r3.xxzx, cb1[0].xxyx
      ftoi r2.xy, r3.xzxx
      ld_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r2.x, r2.xyzw, t0.xyzw
      and r2.y, r1.x, l(0x7f800000)
      ieq r2.y, r2.y, l(0x7f800000)
      lt r1.x, r1.x, l(9.999999939E-009)
      or r1.x, r1.x, r2.y
      movc r2.y, r1.x, l(0), r2.x
      mul r2.x, r1.y, r2.y
      add r4.xy, r2.xyxx, r4.xyxx
    endif 
    iadd r4.z, r4.z, l(8)
  endloop 
  mov r0.zw, r4.xxxy
  iadd r3.y, r3.y, l(8)
endloop 
store_structured g0.xy, vThreadIDInGroupFlattened.x, l(0), r0.zwzz
sync_g_t
if_z vThreadIDInGroupFlattened.x
  ld_structured r0.xy, l(0), l(0), g0.xyxx
  mov r0.zw, r0.xxxy
  mov r1.x, l(1)
  loop 
    ige r1.y, r1.x, l(64)
    breakc_nz r1.y
    ld_structured r1.yz, r1.x, l(0), g0.xxyx
    add r0.zw, r0.zzzw, r1.yyyz
    iadd r1.x, r1.x, l(1)
  endloop 
  mov r0.xyzw, r0.zwzz
  store_uav_typed u0.xyzw, vThreadGroupID.xyyy, r0.xyzw
endif 
ret 
// Approximately 58 instruction slots used
